snippet: Anna Thorvaldsdottir was in the spotlight at the Composer Portraits series, with Either/Or, at Columbia University’s Miller Theater.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews program of works by composer Anna Thorvaldsdottir, performed by new-music ensemble Either/Or at Columbia University’s Miller Theater.
lead_paragraph: Anna Thorvaldsdottir was in the spotlight at the Composer Portraits series, with Either/Or, at Columbia University’s Miller Theater.

headline.seo: Anna Thorvaldsdottir’s Works at Columbia’s Miller Theater
headline.main: Composed of Bumps, Murmurs and Sighs
headline.print_headline: Composed Of Bumps, Murmurs And Sighs
